sources.title: Don Quixote: The Ingenious Gentleman of La Mancha | Full Adventure Drama | James Franco
sources.description:
Don Quixote, an eccentric, elderly gentleman, and Sancho, his hilarious truth-telling sidekick, set out on a journey to right the wrongs of the world. Celebrating its 400th anniversary, the classic novel is re-imagined with rich period details and a moder
2015 .  Stars: Carmen Argenziano, Horatio Sanz(voice), Luis Guzm√°n, James Franco

metadata.Plot: Adapted from the work of Miguel de Cervantes, this is the story of a hidalgo, fanatic for chivalry novels, who loses his sanity and believing to be a knight named Don Quixote de La Mancha, decides to go on imaginary adventures along with his friend, the simple farmer Sancho Panza, who becomes his squire. On their journeys, they rescue dames in distress in honorable acts and fight giants among other perils, with Don longing to be with the love of his life, lady Dulcinea, and Sancho waiting to be rewarded with an island where he's about to become a governor.
metadata.Writer: Miguel de Cervantes y Saavedra, John Mortimer
metadata.Actors: John Lithgow, Bob Hoskins, Isabella Rossellini
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys. 4 nominations total
